mapper.update:
update user
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urgent_contact = #{urgentContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urgent_phone = #{urgentPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
where tb_id = #{tbId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urgent_contact = #{urgentContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urgent_phone = #{urgentPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where tb_id = #{tbId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
